p: Among the entire study population, a total of 20 patients (13.8%) required a modification of psychiatric therapy based on DDIs in according to the psychiatrist’ judgment before the beginning of the DAA-regimen: a dose adjustment of psychiatric drugs was observed in two patients whereas in the remaining 18 patients (10 in group A 9.9% and 8 in group B, 18.6%, p = 0.172) a complete therapeutic change was adopted. In seven cases (7/20, 35%) a therapeutic change was mandatory due to drug-drug interactions.
